content: I’ve been doing this informally for as long as I remember. I never stop myself when I have an idea. I force myself to pause, and jot it down in an ideas book. It doesn’t matter if I never look at it again in my life, I have 10+ full notebooks and sketchbooks of ideas. The point is I allowed myself the freedom to imagine something differently, and it has become a way of life. Though it can get me into trouble, not everyone wants the ideas. I’d rather get in the way just a little than sit back and do nothing. I can’t stop myself from ideating !
